structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Usual Working Hours Reasons Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of reasons affecting usual working hours including environmental, technical, economic, health, and other factors for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Bad weather, technical or economic
structure:Code.common:Description: Deviation from usual working hours due to adverse weather conditions, technical problems, or economic factors.

structure:Code.common:Name: Illness, injury, annual holidays
structure:Code.common:Description: Deviation from usual working hours due to personal health issues, injuries, or scheduled annual leave.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other reason
structure:Code.common:Description: Other reasons for deviation from usual working hours not covered by specific categories.
